Description:
Secluded Style with Surprising Indoor/Outdoor Space!
This distinctive townhouse, tucked away in a private Coburg cul-de-sac, presents an outstanding environment of low-maintenance style and inner-urban convenience - all just moments from Merri Creek trails and acres of parkland. Across two spacious levels, the home's light-filled interior comprises three bedrooms (extra-large master with full-width mirrored robes) and two bathrooms, expansive open-plan lounge and dining areas complemented by a central kitchen with granite benchtops and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other features include panel heating, laundry and under-stair storage space, deep garage (r/c) and additional front off-street parking, plus an undercover balcony and surprisingly large rear courtyard - fully decked, north-facing and wonderfully private. Easy access to a range of lifestyle attractions including local cafes and schools, shops and supermarkets, an endless array of restaurants as well as a choice of tramlines to university/hospital precincts and the CBD.
Insights: 49 Beaumonde Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate, Super Modern Townhouse
The ultimate in comfortable living. This spacious two-story townhouse offers all the modern conveniences you could ask for plus more. Beginning on entry with a long corridor that leads to a rear north-facing bedroom boasting a private decked courtyard, BIRs, and a tastefully decorated, fully tiled bathroom. The upper level is accessed via the centrally located, polished timber staircase which leads to full living spaces with abundant natural light, showcasing timber-look floors, an all-white designer kitchen with stone benches, sleek cabinetry plus a very brilliant looking island with waterfall sides. Hidden from the living spaces is the main bedroom comprising WIRs and full ensuite. Extra features include a euro laundry, secure garage with ample storage and split system air conditioning. Serviced by local bus, train and tram to the city, and the famous array of Sydney Road's boutique shops and cafes.
Insights: 6/260 Reynard Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential In Stand Out Location
Nestled in a stunning street surrounded by its peers, this three bedroom weatherboard gives families, investors and professionals an immense opportunity to enhance its old charm with a modern day renovation. Three scaled bedrooms with BIR's in the first two and an open fire place in the third complement this traditional floor plan, boasting an abundance of potential. Retro styled fitted kitchen into an open dining area fitted with heating along with separate laundry, bathroom and followed by a living area. Add to this a large shed at the rear along with off street parking and all within a short stroll to Batman & Coburg Railway Stations, Coburg North Village shopping precinct, Coburg North Primary School, Sydney Road shops and cafés, Farmer's Market, Coburg Lake, and the Merri Creek bike trail.
Insights: 42 Molesworth Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Charm coupled with potential.
Situated in one of Coburg's finest tree lined streets on a generous block measuring approximately 400m2, this three bedroom California Bungalow gives families, investors and professionals a superb opportunity to enhance its old world charm with a modern day renovation. A traditional layout complements three well scaled bedrooms (the master boasting a bay window) with central kitchen/meals and lounge areas. There's also a tidy bathroom featuring a bath and separate shower, full laundry, second toilet, split system air conditioner and a huge three car garage with workshop and carport accessed via the rear ROW. A stroll to St Fidelis Primary School, it's also within walking distance of Moreland train station, Upfield Bike Path and Sydney Road shops, cafes and trams.
Insights: 42 Clarendon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
When Location And Quality Combine
Situated within a short stroll to Sydney Road Shopping Precinct, Coburg Train Station and local parklands this gorgeous townhouse combines sublime quality and enhanced functionality.
Cleverly planned and luxuriously finished, this spacious street facing townhouse features a reverse floorplan with stairs leading to an expansive sun-drenched living and dining area that spills to an entertainer's balcony complete with a generous study area and powder room. The ground floor comprises two fantastic sized bedrooms, each with mirrored BIR's, a fully equipped modern bathroom complemented by a stone topped double vanity.
The host of additional features include a separate laundry, lock up garage, timber floors, split system air-conditioning and a private courtyard. Currently tenanted returning $2,042.00 per calendar month, this is an ideal first home or investment opportunity in the heart of Coburg.
Insights: 2/28 Kendall Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Instant Appeal, Entertainer's Delight!
Be impressed by this beautiful, 4 bedroom + study, 2 bathroom, weatherboard home on neighbourly street.
Family-friendly floorplan includes: separate, formal lounge with ornate fireplace. Glorious, open plan living/kitchen/dining with exceptional character and effortless style. The perfect sized kitchen with loads of bench space & storage as well as breakfast bench. Double doors flow to your low maintenance yard with large, undercover entertaining area & spa - perfect for a lazy Sunday! 4 good-sized bedrooms + study make this one ideal for families and people who like space.
Side drive leads to double, lock up garage.
Fanastic location walking distance to Coburg West & St Fidelis Primary , Shore Reserve and bus & tram. Easy access to CityLink & only 1.5km to Sydney Road cafes, restaurants as well as Coburg station.
Plan your life here!

Description:
Stylish entry to a lifestyle locale **Expression of Interest Closing Tue 6th Aug 5pm**
Discover designer living with this spacious single bedroom apartment set in the heart of Coburg's lifestyle precinct. Enjoying high-end interiors, this oversized apartment offers easy care luxury in a true lifestyle locale a short stroll to the cafes, shopping and trams of Sydney Road, Upfield Bike Path and moments to local parks and Leisure Centre. Stylish interiors feature a sunny entertainer's balcony extending from open plan living showcasing a designer CaesarStone kitchen with full suite of stainless steel appliances. The generous bedroom with his and hers robes enjoys a stylish ensuite with oversized shower, while a second bathroom incorporating laundry facilities, heating/cooling, secure entry, storage room and car space complete this impressive starter or investment option.

Description:
Californian Captivation with Extended Opulence
An indulgent environment of absolute quality and floorplan flexibility, this expanded 4BR period home delivers a truly aspirational family lifestyle positioned to perfection in a quiet and convenient Coburg neighbourhood. Showcasing a spectacular renovation, the home's totally-transformed interior boasts an extra-large master bedroom with fitted WIR and three additional bedrooms (all with BIRs), luxurious ensuite and equally-stylish main bathroom - both with stylish timber-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this an expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a gourmet stone-bench kitchen with Bosch dishwasher, DeLonghi cooking appliances (including induction cooktop) and butler's pantry. Other stand-out features include reverse cycle heating and air conditioning throughout (living area and all bedrooms), high ceilings throughout, premium carpets and engineered timber floors, soft-close cabinetry, efficient LED lighting, large laundry and excellent storage spaces. Bi-folds from the living area reveal an al-fresco entertaining deck and substantial backyard garden with lush lawn area, plus side driveway and additional off-street parking via the rear ROW. Walking distance to Melville Road trams, local buses, Coburg West and St Fidelis primary schools, zoned to Strathmore Secondary College, it's close to Coburg Station and shopping precinct as well as easy access to Citylink/Tullamarine Freeway. Simply stunning! Land: 13 x 36m (470sqm) approx. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 78 Gordon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Open For Inspection - Saturday 27/7 at 9:15am - 9:45am
Observe this beautifully renovated double fronted weatherboard home, boasting an abundance of timeless features including period cornices, high ceilings, wide hallway entrance and leadlight glass windows throughout. Perfect for families or young professionals, this eye-catching home comprises of 4 generous size bedrooms with reverse cycle heating & cooling, the master offering walk-in robe and en-suite, stunning central bathroom with stone bench tops and bath tub, open plan kitchen/dining/living areas with bi-fold doors opening onto an undercover decking area complemented by a large north-facing rear yard, perfect for entertaining friends and family. Kitchen offering stone bench tops, breakfast counter space, 900mm stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. This is a period charmer in a fantastic locale, walking distance to Batman & Coburg Railway Stations, Sydney Road Shops/Cafés, Harmony Park, Coburg North Primary School and Coburg North Shopping Village, everything Coburg has to offer is only a short stroll away.

Description:
Spacious and Serene with Sweeping Views
Expressions of Interest Closing 4th June at 5pm. Tucked away in the secure Merriview Place complex, this top-floor apartment sets itself apart with its oversized floorplan, quality inclusions and uninterrupted 180° outlook - all just moments from Merri Creek trails and parkland. Bathed in natural light, the home's feature-packed interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with BIRs), master ensuite and stylish main bathroom. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area leading out to a wonderfully wide terrace ideal for relaxing or entertaining while enjoying the fabulous views and spectacular sunsets. Other highlights include a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, split-system heating and cooling, additional ceiling fans, full-size laundry, pool and bbq facilities, video intercom, plus lift to secure entrance foyer, lower-level parking space and large walk-in storage locker. Ideally positioned, it's also walking distance to Coburg High School, De Chene Reserve and Coburg Lake, as well as easy access to Coburg Station and cosmopolitan shopping precinct, Sydney Road trams, cafes and restaurants. An outstanding lifestyle opportunity for professionals, young families and downsizers alike!
Insights: 304a/1 Manna Gum Court, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Pretty Weatherboard on Neighbourly Street!
Set amongst a lovely, tree-lined street, this 2 bedroom home is ready to be spruced and enjoyed!
With an Edwardian Bijou flare, the floor plan includes; 2 large bedrooms, large, separate lounge, kitchen/meals with dishwasher. Bathroom & sep laundry. Neat backyard with garden shed & ROW, roller door access. Lovely high ceilings throughout, ready for your final touches!
Fantastic location close to bus, train, tram & Upfield Bike Path. Walking distance to lovely parklands, Coburg West Primary and St Fidelis. Approx 8km to CBD.
Plan your life here!

Description:
A Tranquil Haven of Timeless Appeal
Timeless period charm fuses with modernised interiors and a flexible floorplan to create a tranquil three bedroom family haven. Introduced by a pretty façade, classic rose garden and porch entry to a wide hall featuring exquisite Art Deco details of rich timber fretwork, picture rails and doors with ceiling rosettes, creamy decor and polished timber floorboards. A traditional layout includes two well-proportioned front bedrooms with leadlight windows and built in robes, rear third bedroom, a lovely bathroom encompassing a chic open shower, exceptional laundry and a spacious ambient lounge with superb French doors and a cosy open fireplace that's perfect for winter huddles. The central kitchen-meals room will impress with stone benchtops, Bosch dishwasher and SS oven, gas cooktop and sleek cabinetry of silver-timber tones. Stylish entertaining offers year round flexibility with a roofed veranda enjoying a picture-perfect garden outlook, Portland St accessed remote garage, open backyard and paved BBQ zone. Inclusive of a second remote gate to off-street parking, ducted heating and cooling, separate toilet, kitchen aircon, low maintenance garden, garage storage and a wide street frontage. Perfectly positioned for city-bound trams, buses, train, quality schools, shops, Shore Reserve and an easy bike ride to Merri Creek and Moonee Ponds trails.
Insights: 41 Lascelles Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Land and Period Potential
Set on a surprisingly large block with excellent ROW access, this semi-detached brick Victorian presents a world of possibilities for those looking to move in and enjoy or the option to extend (STCA). Current floorplan highlights two double bedrooms, neat bathroom and updated kitchen, spacious lounge and adjoining dining. Add to this high ceilings and original Baltic Pine floorboards, plus a deep backyard with secure off-street parking via ROW (to Linsey Street) and plenty of room to expand. Well south of Bell Street, it's close to local schools and parks, Coburg Station, Melville Road / Sydney Road trams, cafes and vibrant shopping precincts.

Description:
Rewarding City Fringe Retreat
Superbly located within walking distance to Coburg station and Sydney Road's shops, cafes, restaurants and trams, this generous apartment offers a sought-after urban lifestyle on the city fringe. The light filled layout includes a bedroom with full ensuite, guest powder room and a generous open plan living zone. Anchored by a stainless steel equipped kitchen, it steps out to an entertainers terrace with room for the BBQ, and friends. Complete with secure carpark, it delivers a fabulous valuable investment opportunity or a rewarding city fringe retreat.
* Secure entry
* Lift
* Concealed laundry
* Full ensuite to bedroom
* Guest powder room
* Split system climate control
* Sun splashed entertainers terrace

Description:
Modern Design Shines
Opposite Bowden Reserve and the Merri Creek this gleaming new three bedroom, two bathroom residence with street frontage embodies desirable modern style enhanced by elegant appointments. Elevated and extending across three levels, it highlights a beautifully proportioned Bosch kitchen/meals/living, with 900mm appliances, leading to a wide covered balcony. Each of the three privately positioned bedrooms offers a WIR or BIR and evidence of quality shines through in Panasonic heating/cooling, video intercom, excellent storage, light enhancing design and stone surfaces throughout, extending into the concealed laundry. Automatic double garage with interior access is included. Trams, buses, Merri Creek Trail and schools are a stroll and vibrant Sydney Road shops, Coburg Market and cafes also close by.
Alexkarbon Real Estate
122 Errol Street, North Melbourne Vic 3051

Description:
Opportunity Awaits!
An excellent opportunity has presented itself. Are you ready? This property offers an exquisite layout and well-designed living spaces. Spread out over two levels there is an abundance of natural light and living space. Whether you're looking for your first home, downsize or rewarding investment this opportunity is not to be missed.
Two generously sized bedrooms both complimented by walk in robe and en suite. Warm carpet greets you throughout the home and storage is at a premium with large cupboards located on both levels. Private balconies on both levels ensure you can enjoy a nice breeze in the comfort of your own home. Well equipped kitchen for any aspiring master chef with a large pantry for all your ingredients. Boasting luxury features such as separate powder room and large laundry there is no going past this apartment when looking for exceptional value. Secure car space and storage just add to the appeal of this property.
A short walk will have you at Sydney Road or Bell Street where you will find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. Transport options are endless with tram routes 19 and 1 only a short distance away. The train is only a moment away with Coburg station servicing the Upfield line ensuring you can get to CBD with minimum fuss. For those who enjoy the great outdoors you will have Merri Creek Trail and Bridges Reserve a stone's throw away.
Insights: 13/3 Wardens Walk, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Peace, privacy and the perfect position
Perfectly positioned to combine the most cosmopolitan of urban lifestyles with the tranquillity of a leafy setting near parkland and Merri Creek, this stylish elevated apartment is peacefully located in a quiet cul-de-sac, yet only minutes from key amenities, cafes, shops and public transport options.
Whilst lovers of inner-city living will relish proximity to so much of Coburgs vibrancy, savvy investors will also note the apartments flawless presentation.
Featuring a bright open plan kitchen and living area, good sized bedroom with built in robes, laundry facilities, secure intercom entry and a large sundrenched balcony.
The secure basement car park also comes with additional storage, electric wall heaters, stainless steel appliances and brand new carpet are just some of the premium features that make this an ideal entry level opportunity.
Insights: 201a/1 Manna Gum Court, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Larger than most and affordable.
You can't go wrong with this affordable and totally secure first floor one bedroom apartment with secure undercover car space and lock up storage facility, Bright open plan living/dining area, with designer stainless steel kitchen, opens to the balcony with plenty of room to entertain friends and family. The modern bathroom is off the bedroom and there's a powder room and separate laundry. The apartment includes intercom, heating and under cover parking space/storage, accessed via electronic gates. Comfortable easy living or Rental investment in handy location, the partridge village is just 9km from the CBD and strolling distance to cosmopolitan Sydney Road's shops, cafes & transport, Lake Reserve & walk/bike tracks and surrounding lifestyle advantages just metres away. So whether you want to enjoy this wonderful place yourself or let someone else pay you for the privilege.
Insights: 6/3 Wardens Walk, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
The Spaces You're Searching For
Featuring a private side and rear courtyard, ready to indulge your inner entertainer, and an appealing design with attractive indoor/outdoor connection, this three bedroom residence is close to practically everything. Just moments to trams, Lake Reserve, schools, cafes and Coburg Market, it's one of only five on site and highlights a spacious and open living, dining and fully equipped kitchen. Updated with stainless steel appliances and stone surfaces, the kitchen benefits from a gas cooktop, dishwasher and Miele fixtures including a fan forced electric oven. Bifold doors lead from the adjoining dining area to an entertainer's deck, and the substantial courtyard has a second access point from the living zone. Upstairs, sunlit bedrooms come with built-in robes and the skylit bathroom, with shower and separate bath, is centrally positioned. A separate toilet, ground floor powder room and concealed laundry add convenience, and a garage with internal access is an asset. Make your mark, base yourself in a buzzing locale and never look back.
Insights: 1/618-620 Sydney Road, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Boutique Bliss with Light and Style!
In an impeccably-maintained block (one of only four), this secluded townhouse presents a wonderful low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity with its indoor/outdoor space, quality enhancements throughout and outstanding urban convenience. Bathed in northerly light, the home's impressive interior comprises two bedrooms (extra-large master) both with built-in robes, contemporary-style central bathroom and additional powder room (second WC). Add to this a sunny lounge leading through to the modern kitchen/meals complete with soft-close drawers, tiled splashbacks and dishwasher. Other stand-out features include an under-stair pantry/storage area and spacious attic storeroom, full-size laundry, solid timber floors, panel heating and ducted evaporative cooling. Step outside to discover an oversized rear courtyard with established gardens and extensive paving, plus the added advantage of a single lock-up garage. Well south of Bell Street and within the Strathmore Secondary College zone, it's walking distance to Melville Road trams and Munro Street buses, close to Shore Reserve and popular primary schools, Coburg Station, Sydney Road eateries and renowned retail precinct as well as easy Citylink access. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 2/49 Rose Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.
